topics.title: Describe a Dream You Had
topics.prompt: Talk about a dream you remember. Describe what happened and how you felt.
topics.hint: 請用三到五句描述夢境內容與感受，可以包括夢中發生的事情和你的情緒。
topics.sample: I dreamed that I was flying in a big forest. Everything looked huge to me. I felt excited but also a little scared. In my dream, I found some delicious fruits. When I woke up, I felt happy.

topics.title: My Favorite Fruit
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite fruit. Explain why you like it and how it tastes.
topics.hint: 說明你喜歡的水果，包含它的味道和你喜歡它的原因，三到五句。
topics.sample: My favorite fruit is mango. It is very sweet and juicy. I like it because it tastes fresh and delicious. Sometimes I eat it with ice cream.

topics.title: Describe Being Small or Big
topics.prompt: Imagine you are very small or very big. Describe what you see and how you feel.
topics.hint: 想像自己變得很小或很大，描述周圍的景象和你的感覺，三到五句。
topics.sample: If I were very small, I would see the grass like big trees. I would feel curious but also a little scared. Everything around me would look new and interesting.

topics.title: Talking About Flying
topics.prompt: Describe what it would be like if you could fly. Where would you go and why?
topics.hint: 說說如果能飛，你會去哪裡？為什麼？用三到五句回答。
topics.sample: If I could fly, I would go to the mountains. I want to see the beautiful views from above. Flying would make me feel free and happy.

topics.title: How to Solve Problems
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you had a problem and what you did to solve it.
topics.hint: 分享一個你遇到問題的經驗，以及你如何解決，三到五句。
topics.sample: Once, I lost my keys. I looked everywhere and asked my family for help. Finally, I found them in my bag. I felt relieved and happy.

topics.title: Describe an Animal You Like
topics.prompt: Talk about an animal you like and explain why it is special to you.
topics.hint: 介紹你喜歡的動物，並說明它對你的特別之處，三到五句。
topics.sample: I like monkeys because they are clever and funny. They can climb trees very well. Monkeys remind me to be curious and playful.

topics.title: Talk About Sharing Food
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you shared food with someone. How did you feel?
topics.hint: 講述你分享食物的經驗，並描述你的感受，三到五句。
topics.sample: I shared my lunch with a friend once. We ate bananas together. I felt happy because sharing made us closer.

topics.title: Describe Tasting Something New
topics.prompt: Talk about a time when you tried a new food. What did it taste like?
topics.hint: 描述你嘗試新食物的經驗，包含味道和感受，三到五句。
topics.sample: I tried pineapple for the first time. It was both sweet and sour. At first, I was surprised, but then I liked it very much.

topics.title: Imagine a Talking Animal
topics.prompt: Imagine an animal can talk. What would you say to it and why?
topics.hint: 想像一隻會說話的動物，說說你會對牠說什麼，為什麼，三到五句。
topics.sample: If a monkey could talk, I would ask it about its life in the forest. I want to know what it likes to do every day. It would be fun to hear stories.

topics.title: Describe Something Huge
topics.prompt: Describe something that is very big or huge. How does it look and make you feel?
topics.hint: 描述一樣非常大的東西，說明外觀和你的感覺，三到五句。
topics.sample: The big tree near my house is very tall. It has many green leaves and strong branches. It makes me feel small but peaceful.
